description: Italy, a European country with a long Mediterranean coastline, has left a powerful mark on Western culture and cuisine.
Paris, France's capital, is a major European city and a global center for art, fashion, gastronomy and culture.
New York City comprises 5 boroughs sitting where the Hudson River meets the Atlantic Ocean.
Bali is a province of Indonesia and the westernmost of the Lesser Sunda Islands.
Bangkok, Thailand’s capital, is a large city known for ornate shrines and vibrant street life.
London, the capital of England and the United Kingdom, is a 21st-century city with history stretching back to Roman times.
Moscow, on the Moskva River in western Russia, is the nation’s cosmopolitan capital.
Sydney, capital of New South Wales and one of Australia's largest cities, is best known for its harbourfront Sydney Opera House, with a distinctive sail-like design
Switzerland is a mountainous Central European country, home to numerous lakes, villages and the high peaks of the Alps.
